author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-102: Implementation as described in the comment. Also adds the Language Identification Engine (LangId) and the KeywordExtractionEngine to the stable launcher.
Configuration with the default configuration for the NER Engine was added to the full, stable, full-war and kres launcher.
NOTE that the correct default initialisation of the NER Engine is implicitly tested by the existing Integration-tests of the Stanbol Enhancer.

author: eric
msg: Temporary workaround to allow james start with spring injection - needs to be fixed later, see TODO (JAMES-1360)
